betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The will to find a way to survive is not a trivial thing.
I can understand why so many here would want to let themselves go. I get it.
You spend so much of your life fighting for what you care for, and right before reaching what you think you need to not be powerless anymore and become capable of changing things, you are asked to remove yourself from the situation you want to affect, you are asked to abandon the lives you want to save.
This trial is not an easy one.
